data.body:
Can you provide some info on the texture? What is the format? What are dimensions?

Also, how many textures do you use in that material? More info on those other textures.
what is your particleD.png size ) webgl cant normally load anything larger than 4096, and in practice some devices even break on 4096 too

@makc  particleD.png   256 × 256    it's not the key I support 
Is there a problem with my code?
Sry, this is not a help site. Use the [forum](https://discourse.threejs.org) or stackoverflow instead.
